original_text: She was dying. The women who were helping her said, ‘Do not be afraid. You have given birth to a son!’ But this did not make her happy. She did not answer them.
korean_text: 죽어갈 때에 곁에 서 있던 여인들이 그에게 이르되 두려워하지 말라 네가 아들을 낳았다 하되 그가 대답하지도 아니하며 관념하지도 아니하고

sentences.original_text: The women who were helping her said
You have given birth to a son!'
But this did not make her happy.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 이것은 그녀를 기쁘게 하지 못했습니다.
